channel.title: If you would choose your Auxy Songs for a future video game, what will they be?
channel.description: My songs I would use is “Resilience” And “Mar Zo - Easy Remix.” What songs would you pick?

item.title: If you would choose your Auxy Songs for a future video game, what will they be?
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
I’m not too sure actually, a lot of my track’s, i dont feel, would really fit well in a game, But i think the best one that would somewhat even fit is an unreleased track of mine that i kinda revolved around some deadmau5 stuff.
https://soundcloud.com/max_chen/deadmau5/s-Weg7e

Read full topic

item.title: If you would choose your Auxy Songs for a future video game, what will they be?
item.dc:creator: P.M
item.description:
I don’t know if this could be in a video game but it could be in a 4 minute game trailer. https://soundcloud.com/user_176587898/cyberspace

item.title: If you would choose your Auxy Songs for a future video game, what will they be?
item.dc:creator: Stigmo
item.description:
I don’t think my songs are usable at all for video games, though a previous beat the clock entry of mine might be, or at least @stereofield commented that it sounded like video music haha.

https://soundcloud.com/stigmomusic/auxy-o-beat-the-clock-13
